response.original_title: Lucas Booth: Journey to the Unknown
response.overview: This mockumentary examines the life of Lucas James Booth, an enigmatic horror filmmaker who vanished without a trace in 1974, leaving many to wonder if his disappearance wasn't somehow connected to the content of his films. Twenty-five years later, two filmmakers decide to delve into the life of this mysterious director -- but after four months of interviews, everyone connected to the project disappears, leaving only this footage behind.
response.title: Lucas Booth: Journey to the Unknown
